document.body:
Trusted Reviews
www.TalkToSonic.com - Sonic Survey Coupon posted on Apr 20, 2011 Sonic Drive-In is a fast food restaurant chain in the United States. Every day it offers over 3 million customers, like you, the facility to drive in their automobiles in any of its more than 3,500 restaurants and enjoy dining. It was established in 1953 and is currently operational in forty-four states of America.
Www.TalkToSonic.com is the site through which its corporate office at Oklahoma City, Oklahoma aims to gather its customers’views about this unique dining experience. You, too, can share your recent dining experience and express your candid views to the company by participating in its‘Guest Satisfaction Survey’through this site. To participate in this survey, you need to enter the ID number located at the bottom of your receipt and complete the survey within 14 days of your recent dining. Your views are very valuable to the company and to show its gratitude, the company will award you a validation code at the end of the survey. You can redeem this code to get a free SONIC Burger on a purchase of medium tot or Single-Patty Burgers, during your future visit to any of its drive-ins.
Website: www.talktosonic.com Tags: restaurant survey , restaurants Category: Surveys&Sweepstakes Advertisement
Comments
I love my Sonic. I go there nearly 7 days a week. Everyonee is so nice. The owner, Mrs. Merle Kelley and her son Douglas, are very good employers. They are extremely nice to their customers. I have withdrawals when we are on vacation or my Sonic is closed. I miss the 2 guys in the car that did the commercials. They were great. I also miss the jalopeno strips you did serve. Please bring them back. Sonic has the best sweet tea in all of Alabama. - posted
20 months ago by Bettye Evans
great service store of emporia ks. - posted
20 months ago by maria
very great service.. friendly and always fast - posted
20 months ago by melissa hackney
i love sonic colas - posted
19 months ago by sharon
great visits everytime doing survey for some senior citizens that have been told they have to retrieve their discount and free RT44 through the internet now. I'm just helping them out. sonic drive-in#1056 - posted
19 months ago by Micheline C. Coats
unable to retrieve coupons for tickets 105609110133,105609120143,105609120164,105665120136,105609170148,105809170095,105609160210,105609170133. I posted these because these Senior citizens were told they could not retrieve these in person anymore that it had to be done online. Dallas Store #1056 214-946-2080 - posted
19 months ago by Micheline C. Coats
Sonic is convenantly located with fast friendly service1 - posted
19 months ago by Alan Swan
Happy Hour is always a treat. The employee who took my order seemed enthusiastic and the employee who brought my order was friendly and helpful. Great attitudes at store - posted
19 months ago by CC
The service was good and the shakes were very good. the employees were friendly and courteous - posted
19 months ago by ERNEST CREWS
All the employees at store 4167 are very nice and courtious and are very prompt with their orders. The food is fair for a fast food restrautant but I do believe their could be some improvement on the valu menu. - posted
